desc_short: Increase chance of being targeted and inflict berserk status on the user
容易被敵人攻擊+對使用者施加狂暴的效果
적의 공격 대상이 될 확률 상승+사용자에게 광폭화 부여
Augmente les chances d'être ciblé et inflige Furie au lanceur
Wird häufiger angegriffen und fügt Nutzer Berserker zu.
Más posibilidad de ser atacado e inflige locura al usuario
desc_long: Increase chance of being targeted and inflict berserk status on the user.
